name: Asian-Inspired Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Elevate your salad game with Melanie Sicard's grilled chicken salad! Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning is used to make both a delicious marinade and a salad dressing. Talk about being versatile!
preparation: In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, seasoning, orange juice, soy sauce, and sesame oil, if using.
Add chicken to bowl; flip to coat. Cover; marinate at least 1 hr or overnight. Discard marinade.
Preheat grill to medium-high. Lightly brush grill with oil to prevent sticking. Grill chicken, with lid closed, 7–8 min per side, until cooked through and lightly charred.
Once cooked, remove from grill and rest 5 min, then slice into pieces.
For the dressing, in a large mixing bowl, whisk together vinegar, orange juice, seasoning, and soy sauce. Set aside.
Thinly slice cabbage, radishes, green onions, and bell pepper. Peel and segment mandarin. Add to bowl with dressing. Toss to combine.
Serve with sliced chicken on top and sesame seeds, if desired.
tips: Swap Napa cabbage for green or purple cabbage.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Enjoy a garlic & ginger taste with your choice of protein. Makes 8 sets of 2 stacked lettuce leaves.
